intro: Korthalsella feuana, commonly known as the Cape snowbush, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Geraniaceae and is characterized by its compact, evergreen shrub form. The plant produces clusters of small, white to pink flowers that bloom in spring. Its leaves are typically rounded and have a slightly hairy texture. Korthalsella feuana is well adapted to coastal and sandy environments, often found in the Western and Eastern Cape provinces.
